# rindeed

Scrape [indeed.com](www.indeed.com) search results.

### Examples

```{r, eval=FALSE}
library(rindeed)
in_setup(country = "us")

ds <- in_scrape("data scientist", "United States")
da <- in_scrape("data analyst", "New York", 2)
head(da, 2)
```

```{r, include=FALSE}
library(rindeed)
```

```{r, echo=FALSE}
in_setup(country = "us")
da <- in_scrape("data analyst", "New York", 1)
knitr::kable(head(da, 2))
```
